venue.name: Hunt Community Home, Mary Meeting Room

item.description:
Show your support for Ron Paul at the next monthly meeting of the Nashua Area Republican City Committee.

Alderman-at-Large and candidate for Mayor David Rootovich will be the special guest speaker.

7:00 PM Social Time
7:30 PM Meeting

Mary Meeting Room at the Hunt Community Home located on the corner of Allds & Main Streets in Nashua.

For those of you who are attending for the first time: Park in front lot, on left as you enter from Allds street. Enter the building through main front glass entrance. We'll have someone waiting to greet you at the doors. The meeting room is in the basement of the building so you need to take the elevator down. Thanks, and we look forward to seeing you on Wednesday night!
item.name: Nashua Area Republican City Committee Meeting
